title: sling slotting
body: i have low ms but i'm still getting sling slotting and i don't know why

replies.body:
It sounds like you're probably experiencing "sling-shotting" or "rubber-banding" in-game. If this is the case, you're probably seeing this due to *Packet loss*, which occurs if there are issues between your PC and our servers. I recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) in order to ensure your local network settings are compatible with League and aren't contributing to these symptoms.

Please let me know if this resolved the issue.
